sentences.en: Eurocops was beaten in the ratings on Channel 4 by Kate and Allie, Hill Street Blues and St Elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 在第4频道的收视率调查中《欧洲警察》被《凯特和阿莉》、《希尔街的布鲁斯》和《何方神圣》打败。

sentences.en: Fittingly, she will spend her year off training her voice to sing blues and jazz.
sentences.cn: 恰好她要休息一年，用来练唱蓝调和爵士乐。

sentences.en: For the uninitiated, Western Swing is a fusion of jazz, rhythm & blues, rock & roll and country music.
sentences.cn: 对于外行人来说，西部摇摆是爵士乐、节奏布鲁斯、摇滚乐和乡村音乐的融合。

sentences.en: He is a protean stylist who can move from blues to ballads and grand symphony.
sentences.cn: 他风格多变，从布鲁斯、乡村音乐到雄壮的交响乐都能驾驭。

sentences.en: He was in the blues on account of his failure in business.
sentences.cn: 他因事业失败而意志消沉.

sentences.en: His singing really does have the depth and the emotional range of the blues.
sentences.cn: 他的歌声确实颇有布鲁斯音乐的内蕴和情感深度。

sentences.en: Interfering in-laws are the prime sources of the blues.
sentences.cn: 喜欢指手画脚的姻亲最让人头疼。

sentences.en: It seems important to sensitize people to the fact that depression is more than the blues.
sentences.cn: 让人们意识到抑郁症不仅仅是心情忧郁，这点似乎很重要。

sentences.en: Kim opted for cooler blues and yellows in the master bedroom.
sentences.cn: 金为主卧室挑选了偏冷色调的蓝色和黄色。

sentences.en: My favorite music genre is blues.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的音乐种类是布鲁斯音乐。

sentences.en: She combines jazz and blues in her music.
sentences.cn: 她的音乐融入了爵士和蓝调的元素。

sentences.en: She has cried the blues about its financial woes.
sentences.cn: 对于经济的困难她叫苦不迭.

sentences.en: She was in the back of a smoky bar singing the blues.
sentences.cn: 她在烟雾弥漫的酒吧深处唱着布鲁斯歌曲.

sentences.en: The immediate ancestor of rock "n" roll is rhythm-and-blues.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐直接源自节奏布鲁斯。

sentences.en: The sound veers between jazz and countrified blues.
sentences.cn: 音乐在爵士乐和乡村布鲁斯乐之间来回转换。

sentences.en: They've revivified rhythm and blues singing by giving it dance beats.
sentences.cn: 他们为节奏布鲁斯的歌曲中加入了舞曲的节奏，使之变得更加活跃。

trans.tran_en: a feeling of depression or deep unhappiness

trans.tran_cn: 把…染成蓝色（blue的第三人称单数）
